for_sales.sales_text:
Gaff cutter, built at Uphams, Brixham, 1935. Pitch pine on oak.

Refurbished 2008-2019.

  • Bukh DV20[diesel] PRM gear box, both reconditioned
  • Main, staysail and jib [2 sets]
  • Keel bolts replaced 2008.
  • Copper fastened.
  • Rudder re built with 18mm ply x3 sheathed in fibreglass.
  • Rigging: 8 & 10 galvanized wire, 12 mm 3 strand polyester lines.
  • Prop 3 bladed [R\H] 17 x 15 bronze. Shaft 1.125 in dia, bronze.
  • Electrics re wired 2019. Control and solar panels, depth sounder, batteries[2]
  • VHF radio [Shipmate RS8300]

Navigation:

  • tricolour mast head,
  • stern[white],
  • lanterns port/starboard[paraffin]
  • Steering and handheld compasses
  • GPS Garmin 76
  • wind vane [hand held],
  • radar reflector
  • trailing log [Walkers Knot master mk 111.

Film extra in "Vindication Swim" film in Newhaven harbour, May 2021.

LOA 28ft[8.5 m] Beam 8ft 8in[2.64m] Draft 5ft [1.5 m] Bowsprit 12ft [3.6m].
